alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Southern Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 06 at 5:54AM MDT until October 07 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MDT SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 6 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Bennett County and Southern Jackson County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
